org.apache.ambari.server.topology

Interface PersistedState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersistedStateImpl

    public interface PersistedState
    Persistence abstraction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<ClusterTopology,List<LogicalRequest>> getAllRequests()
      Get all persisted requests.
      LogicalRequest getProvisionRequest(long clusterId)
      Returns provision request for a cluster
      void persistLogicalRequest(LogicalRequest logicalRequest, long topologyRequestId)
      Persist a logical request.
      PersistedTopologyRequest persistTopologyRequest(BaseClusterRequest topologyRequest)
      Persist a topology request.
      void registerHostName(long hostRequestId, String hostName)
      Registeer a host with a host request.
      void registerInTopologyHostInfo(Host host) 
      void registerPhysicalTask(long logicalTaskId, long physicalTaskId)
      Register a physical task with a logical task.
      void removeHostRequests(long logicalRequestId, Collection<HostRequest> hostRequests)
      Remove the given host requests (must belong to the same topology request), and also the topology request if it does not have any host requests left.
      void setHostRequestStatus(long hostRequestId, HostRoleStatus status, String message)
      Update the status of the given host request.

    • Method Detail

      • persistTopologyRequest

        PersistedTopologyRequest persistTopologyRequest(BaseClusterRequest topologyRequest)
        Persist a topology request.
        Parameters:
        topologyRequest - topology request to persist
        Returns:
        a persisted topology request which is a wrapper around a TopologyRequest which adds an id that can be used to refer to the persisted entity

      • persistLogicalRequest

        void persistLogicalRequest(LogicalRequest logicalRequest,
                           long topologyRequestId)
        Persist a logical request.
        Parameters:
        logicalRequest - logical request to persist
        topologyRequestId - the id of the associated topology request

      • registerPhysicalTask

        void registerPhysicalTask(long logicalTaskId,
                          long physicalTaskId)
        Register a physical task with a logical task.
        Parameters:
        logicalTaskId - logical task id
        physicalTaskId - physical task id

      • registerHostName

        void registerHostName(long hostRequestId,
                      String hostName)
        Registeer a host with a host request.
        Parameters:
        hostRequestId - host request id
        hostName - name of host being registered

      • getAllRequests

        Map<ClusterTopology,List<LogicalRequest>> getAllRequests()
        Get all persisted requests. This is used to replay all requests upon ambari startup.
        Returns:
        map of cluster topology to list of logical requests

      • registerInTopologyHostInfo

        void registerInTopologyHostInfo(Host host)

      • getProvisionRequest

        LogicalRequest getProvisionRequest(long clusterId)
        Returns provision request for a cluster
        Parameters:
        clusterId -
        Returns:

      • removeHostRequests

        void removeHostRequests(long logicalRequestId,
                        Collection<HostRequest> hostRequests)
        Remove the given host requests (must belong to the same topology request), and also the topology request if it does not have any host requests left.

      • setHostRequestStatus

        void setHostRequestStatus(long hostRequestId,
                          HostRoleStatus status,
                          String message)
        Update the status of the given host request.
